resources.string:
A little program to assist me in learning morse code.

To create your own word list create a new text file with the ".txt" suffix in the "Claus' Morse Trainer" directory of the internal storage. Each line should be a character, word or phrase that you want to learn. If the spoken words differ from the morse text then separate the morse text with a vertical pipe "|" from the spoken text (e.g. "fb|fine business").

Special thanks to my CW Academy advisor Dan and buddy Matt for not giving up on me.
